snippet: Once the Mets' deal to send R.A. Dickey to Toronto is finalized, the Mets will become the first team to lose a batting champion and a Cy Young winner in back to back seasons.
abstract: Once the Mets' deal to send R.A. Dickey to Toronto is finalized, the Mets will become the first team to lose a batting champion and a Cy Young winner in back to back seasons.

headline.main: First a Batting Champion, Next a Cy Young Winner Depart Flushing
